full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 688 Filed 06/29/22 Page 117 of 353 Juror ID: 29 DECLARATION I, Juror Number 29 declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing answers set forth in this Jury Questionnaire are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I have not discussed my answers with others, or received assistance in completing the questionnaire. Signed this 04 day of November, 2021 DO NOT WRITE YOUR NAME. PLEASE SIGN USING YOUR JUROR NUMBER. 29 -27- DOJ-OGR-00010870
